subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: John Cook won his first Champions Tour title in his second start on the circuit, closing with a six-under 65 for a two-stroke victory over Mark O’Meara in the AT&T Championship in San Antonio. Cook, an 11-time PGA Tour winner, began the round two strokes behind O’Meara and Tom Kite.
